import time
from WarriorCore.Classes import war_print_class 

console_logfile = None
junit_resultfile = None
resultfile = None
datafile= None
logsdir = None
filename = None
data_repository = None
logfile = None
par_data_repository={}
redirect_print = war_print_class.RedirectPrint(console_logfile)
tc_path = None


[docs]def debug_file(console_filepath):
    global console_logfile

    try:
        console_logfile = open(console_filepath, 'a')
        redirect_print.get_file(console_logfile)
    except Exception,e:
        print "unexpected error %s" % str(e)
        console_logfile = None



[docs]def junit_file(junit_filepath):
    global junit_resultfile
    junit_resultfile = junit_filepath

    

[docs]def set_resultfile(filepath):
    global resultfile
    resultfile = filepath

    

[docs]def set_datafile(filepath):
    global datafile
    datafile = filepath



[docs]def set_logsdir(filepath):
    global logsdir
    logsdir = filepath



[docs]def set_logfile(filepath):
    global logfile
    logfile = filepath



[docs]def set_filename(name):
    global filename
    filename = name

    
    

[docs]def set_datarepository(repository):
    global data_repository
    data_repository = repository




[docs]def set_data_repository_for_parallel(repository):
    global par_data_repository
    par_data_repository.update(repository)
    print par_data_repository



[docs]def set_testcase_path(testcase_file_path):
    global tc_path
    tc_path = testcase_file_path
